name: The Best Internet Experience
description:
made for the Ludum Dare 42 with the theme  Running Out Of space by  @WhitePoulpe @CRG_Koztar @Kirimimiwa  and @17_Flight

The best Internet experience is a game where you experience Internet Explorer on Windows 95 in this game try not to be overwhelmed by advertisements and try to close them all before your PC crashes and displays the blue screen of death!

- your best time is write in the blue screen

- click on internet explorer to start the game

- you can mute the sound by clicking on the sound icon down in the left corner 

- click on start to open the menu
